meanings.sent1: I always miswrite my name on official documents.
meanings.sent2: Please be careful not to miswrite the address on the envelope.
meanings.sent3: I miswrite so often that my friends find it amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a jumbled mess, causing her to miswrite everything she touched.
meanings.sent5: The student's tendency to miswrite made studying for the spelling test challenging.

meanings.definition: An error in writing or spelling.
meanings.sent1: The miswrite in the report changed the entire meaning of the paragraph.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a miswrite in the newspaper article and pointed it out to the editor.
meanings.sent3: The miswrite in the menu made the dish sound much more interesting than it actually was.
meanings.sent4: The miswrite on the sign led many drivers astray.
meanings.sent5: The miswrite on the exam caused confusion among the students.
